overview:
Ryan has worked with over 200 small-medium size gourmet/specialty food businesses through all stages ranging from concept to exit-strategy. Experienced in b2b sales management, business planning, e-commerce consulting, web analytics, SEO, paid search marketing, email marketing.

As a visionary in his field, Gourmet News recently named Ryan as a top entrepreneur under age 40. Ryan has also authored and co-authored numerous industry whitepapers, trade articles, and a specialty food marketing book.

Ryan’s Specialties:

strategic planning, operations, sales management, marketing/advertising management, PR, marketplace analysis, product pricing, supply and logistics networking, import/export, web development, SEO, copywriting, eCommerce consulting and development.
